mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat(type, sender, receiver, message, seatNo) VALUES (#{type}, #{sender},#{receiver}, #{message},#{seatNo})
mapper.select: SELECT type, sender, receiver, message, seatNo, TO_CHAR(time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as time FROM chat WHERE TRUNC(time) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT type, sender, receiver, message, seatNo, TO_CHAR(time, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS time FROM chat WHERE TRUNC(time) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND sender IN (#{receiver}, 'admin') AND receiver IN (#{receiver}, 'admin') ORDER BY time ASC
